Reference Key for Methods/Applications¶

Key definitions are given below.

Method

Reference Key

2+3-body ChIMES

  1. Carbon-1

ChIMES+DFTB

  1. PuH-DFTB

  2. DNTF-DFTB

  3. TiH-DFTB

Iterative Refinement

  1. CO-1

Carbon Condensation

  1. CO-1

2+3+4-body ChIMES

  1. CO-2

Distributed LASSO

  1. CO-2

Active Learning

  1. CO-2

ChIMES+MSST

  1. HN-1

  2. DNTF-DFTB
